Show:

File: src\Titan\Presenter.js

/**
 * Connects the Model to the View
 *
 * @class Titan.Presenter
 * @constructor
 * @param options {Object} An option JavaScript object containing the EventBus and View
 */
var Presenter = Titan.Presenter = function (options) {
    this._configure(options || {});
    this.init();
};

Presenter.extend = extend;

var presenterOptions = ['model', 'collection', 'eventBus', 'view'];

_.extend(Presenter.prototype, {

    /**
     * Method called when Presenter is initialised. Empty by default, it can be overridden to provide functionality
     *
     * @method init
     */
    init: function () {

    },

    /**
     * Replaces the contents of the specified container with the current widget
     *
     * @method start
     * @param $container {Titan.Element} The Element to place the widget within
     */
    start: function ($container) {
        if (this.view) {
            var parent = this.view.getElement().parent();
            if (parent.length == 0 || parent[0] != $container.$el[0]) {
                $container.setWidget(this.view)
            }
        }
    },

    /**
     * Allows options to be specified both at instantiation and when extending.
     * Merges both options and checks for special options in presenterOptions, and applies them directly to the
     * Presenter object, then sets the merged options to this.options
     *
     * @method _configure
     * @param options
     * @private
     */
    _configure: function (options) {
        if (this.options) options = _.extend({}, this.options, options);
        for (var i = 0, l = presenterOptions.length; i < l; i++) {
            var attr = presenterOptions[i];
            if (options[attr]) {
                this[attr] = options[attr];
            }
        }
        this.options = options;
    }

});
